body:
On Mac OS BigSur, cmake complained about CMAKE_MACOSX_RPATH not being set and when linking with uchardet lib from another package it was not found (there will be a PR #24213 for groff new release 1.22.4 where this was problematic).
Added new release 0.0.7 and git location.
title: uchardet: new release + lib image was not found on Mac OSX
